ques: The manual provides ________ instructions.
Can you ________ your decision to the team?
His apology did not ________ the harm he caused.
The company's ________ culture values teamwork.
Could you ________ your point with an example?
They plan to ________ their research findings.
The team aims to ________ the competition.
Change is the only ________ in life.
Can you explain the ________ of events?
Despite the difficult ________, he remained positive.
The project's success depends on the ________.
He maintains a ________ presence in the industry.
His job requires a strong ________ background.
The player's skills allowed them to ________ the game.
His actions are hard to ________ in this context.
She works in a ________ environment.
The movie's plot follows a specific ________.
The author will ________ a new book next month.
The diagrams will ________ the complex process.
The positive effects of the project can't be ________.
She has a ________ understanding of the subject.
Your argument may ________ some of my points.
The artist used colors to ________ emotions.
The evidence will ________ our claims.
Our decision will be influenced by the ________.
The company sought to ________ the market.
Her ________ support helped me through tough times.
Understanding the ________ is crucial.
The newspaper will ________ the article tomorrow.
________ policies need to be updated regularly.
She needed to ________ her absence from work.
________ responsibility is important for businesses.
The ________ noise in the background was distracting.
In this particular ________, we need to act fast.
Her charismatic personality tends to ________ discussions.
We should avoid actions that ________ our goals.
Pictures often help ________ concepts better than words.
The ________ of the story is well-crafted.
It's essential to ________ accurate information.
The project involves some complex ________ aspects.
We need to identify the correct ________ of steps.
The evidence seemed to ________ their claims.
The ________ of the accident are still unclear.
They aim to ________ their work internationally.
They provided ________ updates on the situation.
The circumstances didn't ________ his behavior.
The mountain seems to ________ the landscape.
The book is filled with images that ________ the story.
The ________ details are beyond my expertise.
The ________ office is in the city center.
